build.script:
rollup --no-treeshake --format=cjs -- src/script/niui-core.js src/components/**/*.js > bundle-temp.js
rollup --no-treeshake --format=cjs --banner "window.nui = (() => {" --footer "initComponents(); return { initComponents, animate, copyButton, componentModal, addComponent, componentSlider, componentNotify } })();" -- bundle-temp.js > bundle.js
rm bundle-temp.js
./node_modules/terser/bin/terser -o bundle.min.js --compress --mangle -- bundle.js
